## Public Member Functions

### convertToErrorCode() {#a7ab358791155200f2413654e92050a69}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::DWPError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwp/dwperror-h/#l00013">13</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/dwp/dwperror-h">DWPError.h</a>.
